name: Mountain Racing HD
description:
Mountain Racing is adventurous infinite racing game for everyone.You Will love to play this game again and again.

Features
-HD Quality of Graphics used in the Game.
-There are 5 Different Levels to explore in the Game.
-Game Complexity increases after each level.
-Different obstacles in each level.
-Use right & left arrow keys to accelerate and reverse the vehicle. Use Space key for brake & R key for Reset the car.
-Game is Infinite.
-15 Different Vehicles available for you to use in the Game.
-Fully Tested on iMac, Macbook, Mac Mini.

Note: You can Unlock various vehicles and stages through coins earned in the game. You can also buy coins pack to use in the game.
